channel.title: Run.bat
channel.description: Does anyone have a Run server code i can have ? my computer crashed today and iv spent the past few hours getting it set up to standards, and i need a new run.bat becaus the server i downlaoded does not come with one.

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

try my rune.bat code

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Read full topic

– EDIT: – But hey, not gonna argue with pro’s :|?

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:3, topic:153737”][quote author=tj007razor link=topic=210096.msg1840647#msg1840647 date=1193128063]
here, this is just runserver not compile and it’s very simple, but gets it done. @echo off color 0b title YOURSERVERHERE "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0\bin\java.exe" server -Xmx500m server where is says yourserverhere, you guessed it, put your server name there and where you see “C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0\bin\java.exe”, change that to the path of java.exe on your PC.
[/quote]

EW JRE![/quote]
Without jre you can’t run your server/java applications, so whats with the ‘EW’.

Read full topic
